TEXT.TITLE: KENTUCKY CENTRAL <KENCA.O> UNIT SELLS STATIONS
TEXT.BODY: Kentucky Central Life Insurance Co said its Bluegrass Broadcasting Co Inc subsidiary has agreed to sell two Orlando, Fla., radio stations to TK Communications Inc for 13.5 mln dlrs, subject to FCC approval. Reuter
